resources.string: I mobile number hi contact tracing atan mamawh a ni.

Entirnan, kar kalta khan tu emaw nen puipunna engemaw ah in lo inhnaih viau a, chu mi chu COVID-19 a lo positive a. 

 India Sorkar chuan ni 14 kalta chhunga kha mi kal tawhna zawng zawng te, he app hmang ve tho tu te nena an lo in hnaih tawh dan atangin a chhui let ang. 

 Chumi a chhuina atanga a lo hnaih tawh ho zawng zawngte chu he app kaltlang hian in test turin emaw, mahni lo in quarantine turin hriattirna a thawn ang. 

 He app i lo hman a, contact tracing a i lo tel ve hian nasa takin COVID-19 darh tur venna kawngah nasa takin min pui dawn a. I hrisel zawk theihna kawnga hma la turin India sawrkar i tanpui dawn a ni.
I privacy pawimawh zia hre reng chungin kan theih ang tawkin i data venhim kawngah hma kan la a ni.
Location sharing setting kha 'Always' i dah theih chuan duhthusam a ni a. He setting hi duh anga thlak theih reng a ni.
I mobile number-ah OTP kan thawn e.
I mobile number-ah OTP kan thawn nawn leh e.
I phone leh midang phone inhnaih dan monitor-na atan a ni a. On reng theih chuan duhthusam a ni.
I phone leh midang phone inhnaih dan monitor-na atan a ni a. On reng theih chuan duhthusam a ni.
I Data hi India Sawrkar hnenah chauh a awm a.\nEng lai mahin he app hian i hming leh number hi vantlang hriat theih in a dah chhuak lo.
Eng tawng nge i hman thlang rawh le\nकृपया अपनी भाषा चुनें
Tawng pakhat tal i thlan a ngai.
Phone number dik tak enter rawh
Would you like to be kept informed if you \nhave crossed paths with someone who has \ntested COVID-19 positive?
Mimal tin ten India rama \nCoronavirus darh tur hi \nkan veng thei.

Simply,
1. %s the app 
2. Switch on %s 
3. Set %s to ‘Always’ 

Invite your friends and family to 
install the app too.
Aarogya Setu tracks through a Bluetooth & Location generated social graph, your interaction with someone who could have tested COVID-19 positive.

The App alerts are accompanied by 
instructions on how to self-isolate and what 
to do in case you develop symptoms that 
may need help and support
You will be alerted if someone you have \ncome in close proximity of, even \nunknowingly, tests COVID-19 positive.
With Aarogya Setu, you can protect yourself, \nyour family and friends, and help our \ncountry in the effort to fight COVID-19
If you would like to contribute to a safer India please indicate your acceptance of the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy by clicking on the button below:
There is some error logging you in
OTP i enter kha a dik lo
You are not allowed to sign in
Update thei lo. Tap to retry.
Contact tracing atan bluetooth leh i location hmanga midang nena in interaction te India sawrkar nen share a ni ang.
Your data is always saved on your phone. Share it on secure Government Servers if…
Sending interaction data captured with Bluetooth & Location services to Government of India.
Your data is now secured on Government of India servers.
To keep you safe and up-to-date, this app needs access to bluetooth and location. You can enable these in your phone settings.
Location settings are inadequate, and cannot be fixed here. Fix in Settings.
Bluetooth must be on at all times to track your proximity to other devices and give you accurate safety updates.
Make sure your phone is connected to the WiFi or switch to mobile data.
COVID-19 positive i nih emaw, test mek i nih chauhin share tur
Health ministry toll-free helpline for queries related to COVID-19
Scan QR Code to check health status of someone else
Scan QR Code to get my health status
Official Aarogya Setu app atanga generate a ni lo.
Code generate tha turin lo dil leh rawh
is at low risk of infection
is at moderate risk of infection
is at high risk of infection
Qr code lak nan i phone-ah permission set a la ngai
QR code scan turin Camera permission a ngai.
A lot of Features like Helpline, Privacy Policy, Terms of Use and more can be found here.
